scripts.build: npx wrangler types --env-interface CloudflareEnv ./env.d.ts && next build
scripts.build:prod: npm run content:all && npx opennextjs-cloudflare build && npx wrangler build --env prod
scripts.build:dev: npm run content:all && npx opennextjs-cloudflare build && npx wrangler build --env dev
scripts.preview: npm run build:prod && npx wrangler dev -e prod --x-remote-bindings
scripts.deploy: npm run build:prod && npx wrangler deploy -e prod
scripts.upload: npm run build:prod && npx wrangler upload -e prod
scripts.preview:dev: npm run build:dev && npx wrangler dev --env dev --x-remote-bindings
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:dev && npx wrangler deploy -e dev
scripts.upload:dev: npm run build:dev && npx wrangler upload -e dev
scripts.db:migration:new: npx wrangler d1 migrations create D1_POSTS
scripts.db:migrate: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply D1_POSTS
scripts.db:migrate:remote: npx wrangler d1 --env prod migrations apply D1_POSTS --remote
scripts.content:all: npm run content:postsJson && npm run content:albumsIndex && npm run content:searchIndex && npm run content:sitemap && npm run content:redirects
